instruction.value: Apply a thin layer of cream locally to lesion.

AdditionalNotes.value: Recommend treatment continue until the inflammatory reaction reaches the erosion, ulceration and necrosis stage; then discontinue.

BackgroundInformation.value: Increased sensitivity to sunlight, use a sun block with a minimum 15 SPF.

AHFSName.value: Skin and Mucous Membrane Agents, Miscellaneous
